mapper.insert: insert into task_template( task_name, task_status, task_start_time, task_completed_time, task_priority, create_time, user_id )values( #{taskName}, #{taskStatus}, #{taskStartTime}, #{taskCompletedTime}, #{taskPriority}, sysdate(), 1 )

insert into task_repeat( template_id, repeat_value, end_repeat, end_repeat_date, num, frequency_value, selected_item, create_time )values( #{templateId}, #{repeatValue}, #{endRepeat}, #{endRepeatDate}, #{num}, #{frequencyValue}, #{selectedItem}, sysdate() )
